overview:
Marley Lisboa, is a an entreprenuer, industry enthusiast, and works for the mobile application, The MenView.

Marley, a graduate of The Howard University Phi Beta Kappa, is currently in charge of all of the operations that the restaurant menu driven application, The MenView, partakes in. He has worked with the company since 2010 in Pasadena, CA. With a marketing driven attitude and evolving knowledge in creating products that consumers will actually benifet from, Lisboa takes on the view as a consumer rather then developer to make the company more succesful. His duties include facilitating key aspects of domestic expansion and partnerships, implementing development and marketing strategies, handling media and press, and promoting the company while helping restaurants to promote themselves.

Outside of The MenView, he is also a supporter for the fight against Autism, having worked with children in different parts of Los Angeles with the condition, or as he has put it “with the difference, not the disorder”. He also supports breast cancer, thyroid cancer, Asperger Syndrome, and various other medical condition initiatives.
